titleStmt.title: An Æthiopian historie written in Greeke by Heliodorus: very vvittie and pleasaunt, Englished by Thomas Vnderdoune. With the argumente of euery booke, sette before the whole vvoorke
Aethiopica. English
titleStmt.author: Heliodorus, of Emesa.
Underdown, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie VVykes, for Fraunces Coldocke, dwellinge in Powles Churcheyarde, at the signe of the greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The Æthiopian history of Heliodorus. ..
